mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Mr. and Mrs. Powel to Martha Washington, 1792 June 8
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Powel, Elizabeth Willing, 1743-1830
Powel, Samuel, 1738-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Speaker of the Senate of Pennsylvania [Mr. Powel] will wait on President and Mrs. Washington on Thursday -- Mrs. Powel sends regrets. Autograph letter, 1 page, copy, in hand of Mrs. Powel with cover, watermark (HS Sandy Run), in 3rd person. Name on original manuscript appears as "Powel, Mrs."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
Washington, George, 1732-1799
